metadata.title: CVE-2020-25284 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The rbd block device driver in drivers/block/rbd.c in the Linux kernelthrough 5.8.9 used incomplete permission checking for access to rbddevices, which could be leveraged by local attackers to map or unmap rbdblock devices, aka CID-f44d04e696fe.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-25284` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required
